EmailTemplate.name: RCMP-Email-4-EN.EM-4-RCMP-EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Your account update is here.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
Thanks for trusting Grand & Toy for your office needs. As a valued Federal Government customer, we want to make sure you’re aware of the latest deals, trends and features available to you so you can get the best value and experience every time. Trending Products for RCMP: Jabra Headsets for superior sound quality Cleaning Solutions for daily hygiene Office Seating for comfort and style
Learn more <[[https://grandandtoy.com/Gov?cmp=ABM-FedGov-RCMP&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Tip of the Month To save time and make your day more productive we’ve developed a group ordering tool where your team can select their favourite products, while you get final say in what gets ordered. Benefits include easy order management, time savings and complete control. It’s the perfect solution for your procurement concerns.
I hope this helps and if you’re interested in learning more about how I can help you, lets schedule a phone call. Below is a link to my calendar, pick a time that works best for you!
Book a meeting with me <[[https://calendly.com/juliehayter]]>
Best, Julie Hayter Government Account Manager | Directeur De Comptes If you're having difficulty accessing the link in this email, please copy and paste the following link into your web browser: https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/government/default.aspx 900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON K1G 0Z7 E-mail: juliehayter@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:juliehayter@grandandtoy.com]]> | Tel: 613-851-4630 E-mail: FederalServices@grandandtoy.com | Tel: 866-511-4534 | Fax: 877-214-3958 Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom | Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/gov/?cmp=ABM-FedGov-RCMP&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
